com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation

Class RAM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.RAM

  • public class RAM
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing RAM in Mano's computer as detailed in:
    Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
    By M. Morris Mano
    Published by Prentice-Hall, c 1993
    Chapter 5, pp 123-172.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<javafx.collections.ObservableList<Memory>> values 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int addressSize
      The integer number of bits the addresses in this RAM support.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Memory> values
      The Integer values currently in this RAM.
      private int valueSize
      The integer number of bits the valuesProperty in this RAM support.
      private javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<javafx.collections.ObservableList<Memory>> valuesProperty
      The Integer values property currently in this RAM.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RAM()
      Constructor which is the equivalent of calling RAM(int, int) arguments Computer.ADDRESS_SIZE and Computer.VALUE_SIZE.
      RAM(int addressSize, int valueSize)
      addressSize and valueSize must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RAM

        public RAM()
        Constructor which is the equivalent of calling RAM(int, int) arguments Computer.ADDRESS_SIZE and Computer.VALUE_SIZE.

      • RAM

        public RAM(int addressSize,
           int valueSize)
        addressSize and valueSize must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        addressSize - The integer number of bits the addresses in this RAM support.
        valueSize - The integer number of bits the valuesProperty in this RAM support.

    • Method Detail

      • maxAddress

        public int maxAddress()
        Returns:
        Integer representing the maximum unsigned value an address in this RAM can be.

      • values

        public java.util.ArrayList<Memory> values()
        Returns:
        values.

      • valuesProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<javafx.collections.ObservableList<Memory>> valuesProperty()
        Returns:
        valuesProperty.

      • write

        public void write(int address,
                  int value)
        address and value must pass validate(int, int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        address - Integer address to write to in this RAM.
        value - Integer value to write to address in this RAM.

      • validate

        private void validate(int address,
                      int value)
        Validates that this RAM has address address and could hold value.
        Parameters:
        address - Integer address to test if this RAM has.
        value - Integer value to test if this RAM can hold.

      • validateAddress

        private void validateAddress(int address)
        Validates that this RAM has address address.
        Parameters:
        address - Integer address to test if this RAM has.

      • validateValue

        private void validateValue(int value)
        Validates that this RAM could hold value.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to test if this RAM can hold.

      • read

        public int read(int address)
        address must pass validateAddress(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        address - Integer address to read from in this RAM.
        Returns:
        Integer value which is at address address in this RAM.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The space delimited String of the four character hexadecimal representations each value in this valuesProperty.
